original_text: Now as soon as Jacob saw Rachel the daughter of Laban his mother's brother, and the sheep of Laban his mother's brother, Jacob came near and rolled the stone from the well's mouth and watered the flock of Laban his mother's brother.
korean_text: 야곱이 그의 외삼촌 라반의 딸 라헬과 그의 외삼촌의 양을 보고 나아가 우물 아귀에서 돌을 옮기고 외삼촌 라반의 양 떼에게 물을 먹이고

sentences.original_text: Now as soon as Jacob saw Rachel
the daughter of Laban his mother's brother
and the sheep of Laban his mother's brother
and rolled the stone from the well's mouth
and watered the flock of Laban his mother's brother
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 어머니의 오라비 라반의 떼에게 물을 주었다
